bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers and Step-Voltage Regulators
Redline
IEEE Standard for Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers and Step-Voltage Regulators - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.35-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.35-1996) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard covers bar code label requirements for specific types of distribution transformers and step-voltage regulators. Data content for temporary and permanent bar code labeling is described as well as bar code label print quality and durability requirements.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
